name: TigerTransit
0:
”Alexa, open Tiger Transit.”
”When will the next bus arrive at Peachtree Apartments?”
”How long until a transit is at Eagles West?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tiger transit
des: War Eagle, Tiger Transit riders! The Tiger Transit skill for Alexa gives users the ability to find out when the next bus will arrive at a specific stop, hands-free. All that you need to know is the name of the stop you want to find bus times for, and Alexa will take care of the rest.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
